synopsis.text:
Despite the peaceful coexistence of humans and extraterrestrial beings known as the Citizens of the Stars on the distant planet Tokinea, a war erupts when the aliens accuse humanity of polluting their shared home with machinery. In response, humans create the Majin project, a military initiative that combines human and alien DNA to create powerful hybrid weapons. Among these weapons is a young girl called Majin no. 7, who possesses extraordinary abilities.

The story follows Yuuri, a member of the Superior Soldier Team, who is tasked with taking care of Majin no. 7, whom he names Honoka. Initially reluctant, Yuuri forms a deep bond with Honoka as they fight together on the battlefield. With humanity on the brink of extinction, Yuuri and Honoka become their last hope for survival. As they embark on a journey to turn the tide of the war, they discover their true purpose and the value of their newfound friendship. Can Yuuri and Honoka overcome their doubts and unite to save humanity from the Citizens of the Stars? Join them on their epic adventure to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
